ComicInfo.Summary:
The Death Defying ‘Devil’s time in the Winslow house brings him closer to the people he has sworn to protect, but a mystery inside the house is blooming, while the enemy outside moves in closer. Threats loom everywhere and the ‘Devil may be the greatest of them all.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | In-Hyuk Lee | 1 | B | Cover B | Lucio Parrillo | 2 | C | Cover C | Riccardo Federici | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Riccardo Federici | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Crimson Devil" Edition Variant Cover | Lucio Parrillo | 5 | F/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Blue Hue" Edition Variant Cover | Lucio Parrillo | 6 | G/Ri | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Riccardo Federici | 7 | H/RI | High End Virgin Cover | Lucio Parrillo | 8 |
